DOC.brief_summary: This study examine efficacy , safety effect hemoglobin level , weekly subcutaneous injection epoetin beta ( 30,000 IU ) anemic participant non-Hodgkin 's lymphoma , chronic lymphocytic leukemia multiple myeloma . The anticipated study duration 4 month , target sample size 30 individual .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Assess Hematopoyetic Response Anemic Patients With Hematologic Malignancies Treated With Erythropoietin B
DOC.criteria: Adult participant diagnosis nonHodgkin 's lymphoma , chronic lymphocytic leukemia multiple myeloma Anemia Screening Visit Transfusion red blood cell within 2 month study drug Treatmentresistant hypertension Acute chronic bleeding ( require therapy ) within 3 month study drug
